They deal slightly more damage than [[giant goldfish]], and trade a little more [[AC]] for a little less [[EV]]. So long as you face them while standing on the shore, they aren't too much of a threat. They can be found in [[the Shoals]]. ==Tips & Tricks== *Ranged attacks or [[poison]] will help keep them from fleeing out to sea. ==History== Sharks were removed in [[0.15]].
